title: its on the same resolution ive used for 7 years and still signal out of range
body: So i just logged in waited for the nwe patch and started a game and for some fkin reason signal is out of range with the SAME resolution i use always i checked the notpad i checked ingame after i figured out i can alt enter for windowed... why is that happening does anybody have an idea how can this be fixed ????

replies.body:
This is a known bug that's affecting some players that are running Fullscreen mode in League. We're still looking into a fix, so I don't have an ETA available on when that will go out.

It sucks that it impacted that match, sorry fam. :/   Let me know if you have any questions.

Just chill out man , a lot of people its getting into this issue , just wait while we find out when riot finds a solution , you can go to cfg game folder , and switch the Window mode to 1 from 0 and you can play windowed , if you try to switch to fullscreen in game after you switched to windowed from the cfg folder , it doesn't work i assure you that  ... i hope this helps you out .
